title: Seikaisuru Kado: Aoi Haru to Railgun
original_name: 正解するカド 青い春とレールガン
sinopse:
The manga takes place immediately after the end of episode five of the anime series, and tells another story not told in the anime. The manga follows high school students whose lives are completely changed after the arrival of the Kado cube and the unlimited energy source Wam.

(Source: ANN)
